price: 92. Kasi soki azalaki okati ya baye baboyaki mpe babungi,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
